name: dado (Zutano Games)
description:
Welcome to dado! A casual dice puzzle game.

Follow the instructions on screen and do your best to figure out the puzzles. There are 6 levels in total, one for each face of a die.

NOTE: I'm aware of some issues with the last level. Since GMTK Game Jam is still ongoing, I'm unable to upload a fixed version until the jam is over. Thank you for your patience!

Music by axle95
